meta.description: Language labels for database tables/fields belonging to extension 'lowlevel_scheduler_task'

languageKey.label: Lowlevel update refindex
Running the lowlevel refindex process.
!!!! Lowlevel cleaner - Deletes records and files.
!!!! Running the lowlevel cleaner process. Keep in mind that this process will really delete records and files from your environment. Take sure that the backup of your environment is working.
Syslog entries
Sends the last 25h upcoming syslog entries to your eMail address.
